QicsTable Documentation Set

Demo - Spreadsheet

This demonstration program shows QicsTable used in a spreadsheet-like environment. In the source, you will find examples of setting properties on cells, selection handling, loading and saving data from text files, and other QicsTable features.

This demo is a work-in-progress.

The code in this example can be found in <QICSDIR>/examples/spreadsheet.

  • spreadsheet.h Class Definitions
  • spreadsheet.cpp Program Code
  • QicsDataItemCurrencyFormatter.h Formatter class for currency
  • QicsDataItemCurrencyFormatter.cpp Code for currency formatter class
